query:
SELECT 
  campaign_type,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'enabled' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as enabled_count
FROM campaigns 
GROUP BY campaign_type
ORDER BY campaign_type;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute SELECT 
  campaign_type,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'enabled' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as enabled_count
FROM campaigns

ORDER BY campaign_type;
